main_definition: A husband is a married man in relation to his spouse.

meanings_and_examples.example: John has been happily married to his wife, Mary, for 10 years.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Head of the family unit in some cultures
meanings_and_examples.example: In many traditional societies, the husband is seen as the provider and protector of his family.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Partner responsible for supporting a spouse financially and emotionally
meanings_and_examples.example: As a supportive husband, David ensures that he contributes to their household expenses and provides emotional comfort to his wife during tough times.
